text: This list shows a list of sovereigns of the country which is now Montenegro, since 1696. == Vojislavljevic Dynasty == VOJISLAV I (1018-1043) Name Birth- death Reign Notes NEDA 1043-1046 GOJISLAV 1046 MIHAILO I died 1081 1046-1081 KONSTANTIN fl.1072-1101 1081-1101 MIHAILO II 1101-1102 DOBROSLAV 1102 SERBIAN OCCUPATION 1102-1146 RADOSLAV 1146-1152 VUKAN c.1150-c.1210 1202-1204 SERBIAN OCCUPATION 1204-1356 BALSA I 1356-1362 == Balsic Dynasty == DURAD I 1362-1378 *BALSA II 1378-1385 *DURAD II 1385-1403 *BALSA III 1403-1421 == House of Crnojevic == *STEFAN 1451-1465 *IVAN 1465-1490 *DURAD II 1490-1496 *STEFAN II 1496-1498 *IVAN II 1498-1515 == Bishopric of Montenegro == *VAVILA 1493-1520 *GERMAN 1520-30 *VASILIJE 1532-1540 *NIKODIM 1540 *ROMI 1540-1559 *MAKARIJE 1560-1561 *RUVIM I 1561-1569 *PAHOMIJE I 1569-1579 *GERASIM 1579-1582 *BENJAMIN 1582-1591 *NIKANOR AND STEFAN 1591-1593 *RUVIM II 1593-1636 *MARDARIJE 1639-1649 Name DOB-DOD Picture Notes Reign VISARION I 1649-1659 MARDARIJE II 1659-1673 RUVIM III 1673-1685 DANILO I 1670-1735 picture unavailable first ruler of Montenegro 1696-1735 SAVA II , PRINCE OF MONTENEGRO Jan 18 1702-Mar 9 1782 unavailable 1735-1782 STJEPAN MALI 1739-Sep 22 1773 Only ‘’tsar’’ of Montenegro 1767-1773 VASILIJE III 1709-1766 with Sava II 1750-1766 ARSENIJE PLAMENAC 1781-1784 PETAR I , PRINCE OF MONTENEGRO 1744-1830 1784-1830 == Kingdom of Montenegro == Picture Name and Birth-death Reign Notes PETAR II 1813-December 31 1851 1830-1851 DANILO I May 25 1826-August 13 1860 1851-1852 (METROPOLITAN OF CETINJE) 1852-1860 (KING OF MONTENEGRO) last Bishop of Montenegro Nikola I 1840-1921 1860-1918 First and last king of Montenegro Category:Lists of monarchs Category:Lists of European people Category:Montenegro-related lists
title: List of rulers of Montenegro
